"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Carousel } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { courseService } from "../services/api" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" const HomePage = () => { const [featuredCourses, setFeaturedCourses] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const { user } = useAuth() useEffect(() => { const fetchFeaturedCourses = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const response = await courseService.getAllCourses() // Get up to 3 courses to feature setFeaturedCourses(response.data.slice(0, 3)) } catch (err) { console.error("Error fetching featured courses:", err) } finally { setLoading(false) } } fetchFeaturedCourses() }, []) return ( {/* Hero Section */}
